title: Blockchain Bank
description:
This system is built following an online course made by Dapp University. This is my github link to the codebase of the version I built.

Concepts used to build this system:

  • Code deposit, withdraw, borrow, payoff functions in bank smart contract
  • Deploy token and bank smart contract to local ganache blockchain
  • Frontend coded in ReactJS
  • Frontend communicate with smart contracts on the blockchain using web3.js

Link to youtube video
